Name: ItemShop
About the game: Special Sale start 2022/02/24 Purchase ItemShop 40% OFF! 2022/02/24 to 2022/03/09 --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Update!! NEW Version ItemShop20220221 The new version was published, February 2022! If you have purchased the previous version, you can download the latest version at no extra charge. Don't miss it! The list of 19 additional items. ・3 types of signboards (single-sided hand-held, double-sided hand-held, hanging type) ・Text input ・Paw Glove (right/left)*for hand only ・Sneakers (right/left) ・Shovel ・Pith helmet ・Backpack (2 Type) ・Alarm Clock ・Watch ・Necklace Chain ・Guitar ・Cowboy hat ・Cowboy boots (right/left)*for foot only ・Sheriff's Badge *Other features ・4 sample avatars (No.17 to No.20) added. --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Version 20211125 The new version was published, December 2021! This version is full of Holiday season's items! If you have purchased the previous version, you can download the latest version at no extra charge. Don't miss it! The list of 22 additional items. ・Glove with string ・Roses (with stem/without stem/with stem and leaves) ・Reindeer horn (large/small) ・Gloves (right/left) ・Crown of thorns ・Candy cane ・Snowflake (large/small) ・Bell ・Snowflake ・Reindeer hat ・Snowballs ・Santa's sack ・Flower ribbons ・Cone hat ・Star (large and small) ・Pompon hat ・Reindeer ・Ribbon extra large *Other features Four sample avatars (13-16) have been added. *Fixed issues Fixed issues in the save/load function. **************************************** What is 'Item Shop'? This is an application for Windows 10 that allows you to add cute items such as ribbons, catnip, tails, etc. to VRM, a common format for 3D avatars. If you have a VRM format avatar, you can use CecilHenShin, VRoid, or any other VRM. more than 75 items included in the app! Each item can be edited for color, size, and position. Item list 3 types of glasses Sunglasses Cat's ear Tails 7 kinds of ribbons (twin/bangs/stripes/kumihimo/oversized stripes/etc.) Two types of catsuits (large and small) School bag School backpack Dog Baseball cap Casket Nurse's cap Masks Helmets 2 types of goggles Baguette Pineapple Arrow apple Floats French bread Toast Star Sticks Toast 2 kinds of hair wigs Horn Bell Pumpkin Bandage Plaster cast Skull (large/small) Fish borne Chain Heart Cream Axe Scarf Witch's hat Feathers Two types of wigs (belly short/twin-tail) Cat Bat Black wings (right/left) White wings (right/left) Maid headdress Ghost Horns Paper bag String Cuffs Nekomimi Headphones Chou Chou Cookie Leg net decoration Cushion Kunai Set of kunai Ninja’s arm guard Headband with horns Straw hat Sunflower Penguin Flower crown You can arrange and combine them in various ways! Language supported Japanese and English . You can switch interface language Japanese and English in the app. Compatible with VRoidHub! Import your favorite VRMs stored in VRoidHub or PC into the app and add cute items to them! The avatar with the items can be exported. You can output the avatars with the items attached. Enjoy them on various virtual SNS and compatible applications! You can output your avatar after attaching items. The trial version cannot output VRMs. If you want to output VRM, please use the official version. Preset avatars are included . If you don't have a VRM, don't worry! Two preset avatars (girls) and nine sample avatars with items are included from the start. The preset avatars allow you to change and adjust the outfit, shoes, hair color, eyes, socks, skin color, body size, and body balance. Create your favorite avatar first, then use lots of items to decorate it! Do you wanna make 'kawaii' dresses for your VRM？【DressMaker】 / 【DressMaker Pro】NOW ON SALE! /
